question: Name two notable lakes surrounding Trakai, Lithuania.
true_answer: Galvė Lake and Lukos Lake (also known as Bernardinų Lake).
asked_question_translated: Wymień dwa godne uwagi jeziora otaczające Troki na Litwie.
answer: Dwa godne uwagi jeziora otaczające Troki na Litwie to Jezioro Galwie oraz Jezioro Trockie.
answer_translated_eng: Two notable lakes surrounding Trakai in Lithuania are Lake Galva and Lake Trakai.
